name: Going For A Roll
description:
The short and sweet Roll'Em'Up, Going For A Roll! Created for the two week  Black and White Jam #7,  Going For A Roll is a game where you roll up objects to increase your snowball's size in order to form a larger snowman. Rack up high-scores by gaining more mass and and clearing levels faster throughout the nine levels. 

Controls -

WASD/Arrow keys - Movement

Z - Select

X - Retry level at any time

Q - Go back to level select screen

Credits - 

OST by Alex Falkenberg

SFX from LittleRobotSoundFactory

Everything else by myself
